Download ERA5 Data

Source: R/01_ERA5_API.R
download_ERA5.Rd

This function uses the ecmwfr package to download ERA5 data for each site specified in the AmeriFlux site metadata dataframe. The temporal and geographical coverage of the downloaded data will match the AmeriFlux site metadata dataframe.

Usage

download_ERA5(
  my_token = NULL,
  site_metadata = NULL,
  mask = NULL,
  download_path = NULL
)

Arguments

my_token

(character) A secret ECMWF token.

site_metadata

(data.frame) A data frame that has the AmeriFlux site metadata. Create the metadata with get_site_metadata().

mask

(character) File path to the ERA5 land-sea mask. Get the mask with get_land_sea_mask().

download_path

(character) Path to the folder where the ERA5 data will get downloaded to.

Value

(character) Paths to the downloaded files.

Examples

On this page
